🔒 Privacy & Security

🔒
On-device processing: Voice analysis can be performed locally for enhanced privacy
🛡️
Data encryption: All voice data is encrypted in transit and at rest
⏰
Auto-deletion: Voice recordings are automatically deleted after analysis
👤
Anonymization: Personal identifiers are removed from analysis data

🔬 Technology Stack

Azure Cognitive Services

  • • Speech-to-Text API
  • • Text Analytics API
  • • Language Understanding (LUIS)
  • • Health Text Analytics

Analysis Capabilities

  • • Real-time emotion detection
  • • Mental health keyword extraction
  • • Sentiment analysis
  • • Risk assessment algorithms

Privacy Features

  • • On-device processing option
  • • End-to-end encryption
  • • Automatic data deletion
  • • HIPAA compliance ready
